page.title: 12HIGHLAND INDUSTRY
page.content: There is very little Industry in Assynt due to lack of raw material & distance from the Market place. We do have a thriving Pottery Industry & a small Plant-Hire firm. The Pottery was encouraged to Assynt by the H.I.D.B. & was set up in 1974. They now employ 14 people. Their markets are Scottish Craft shops, London, & the U.S.A. Their material comes from Devon, Dorset, & Scotland. The Plant-Hire firm services the Community with various plant & equipment. There is also a new Shell-fish processing firm called Gricks. They grade & freeze prawns caught near Lochinver. They employ several people. There is provision for future Industry in the form of a proper Industrial site built by the Regional Council.
